original: zhes bya ba ste /

original: skye ba ni rnam par shes pa'o //

analyzed: las kyi mthu las byung ba'i skye mched drug gi mtshan nyid can no //

analyzed: sprul pa rnam par lta ba bzhin // las rnams kyis sprul 'gro ba yis //

analyzed: thos pa'i spyod yul ni thos pa'i yul du gyur pa rnams so //

original: lus kyi 'khrul 'khor bdag med 'di //
analyzed: lus kyi 'khrul 'khor bdag med 'di //
translated: so this body machine, which is without a self,

original: de bzhin bya ba byed par 'gyur //
analyzed: de bzhin bya ba byed par 'gyur //
translated: performs actions.

original: zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: Thus he says.

analyzed: sgyu ma nyid kyi 'khrul 'khor gyi gzugs brnyan gyi mi gang yin pa de ni sgyu ma'i 'khrul 'khor gyi mi'o //

original: bya ba tha dad byed pa ltar //
analyzed: bya ba tha dad byed pa ltar //
translated: Just as he performs various actions,

translated: just as he does not have action and conduct, so he performs various actions and conducts of the body, such as going, etc.

original: de bzhin du /
analyzed: de bzhin du /
translated: In the same way,

original: lus kyi 'khrul 'khor bdag med 'di //
analyzed: lus kyi 'khrul 'khor bdag med 'di //
translated: this body-machine is without self.

original: zhes bya ba ste /

analyzed: gang gi phyir bdag dang bral bas na bdag med pa zhes bya ste /
translated: Since it is devoid of self, it is called without self.

analyzed: de ltar bdag med pas na 'di la ni don dam par bya ba dang ldan pa 'ga' yang med do zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
translated: Since it is thus without self, it does not have any action in the ultimate sense.

original: de bzhin bya ba byed par 'gyur //
analyzed: de bzhin bya ba byed par 'gyur //
translated: In the same way, it performs action.

analyzed: smig rgyu dang mtshungs bar yang bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: In order to demonstrate that it is also like a mirage, it is said:

original: skad cig re re 'byung 'gyur ba //
analyzed: skad cig re re 'byung 'gyur ba //

analyzed: 'di ni smig rgyu dag dang mtshungs // zhes bya ba smos te /

analyzed: dmigs pa rnam pa sna tshogs gang yin pa de ni nye bar dbye bas yongs su brtags pa yin la /

analyzed: gang dang gang zhes bya ba ni skad cig ma'i mtshan nyid can no // skad cig re re 'byung 'gyur pa //

original: zhes bya ba ni skad cig re re zhing skye bar 'gyur ba'am /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni skad cig re re zhing skye bar 'gyur ba'am /
translated: This is the arising of each moment.🔽

original: mtshan nyid so sor 'byung bar 'gyur bas na /
analyzed: mtshan nyid so sor 'byung bar 'gyur bas na /
translated: Since they arise with distinct characteristics,

original: skad cig re re @4b 'byung 'gyur ba //
analyzed: skad cig re re @4b 'byung 'gyur ba //
translated: they arise in every moment.

original: zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ste /
translated: This is the meaning of the verse.

original: skad cig ma nyid do zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
analyzed: skad cig ma nyid do zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
translated: The word “moment” is understood.

original: de yang don dam par ngo bo nyid ji lta bu zhe na /🔽mthong na 'jig cing mtshan nyid bral //
analyzed: de yang don dam par ngo bo nyid ji lta bu zhe na / mthong na 'jig cing mtshan nyid bral //
translated: What is the ultimate nature of that?🔽It is seen to be destroyed and devoid of characteristics.

original: 'di ni smig rgyu dag dang mtshungs //
analyzed: 'di ni smig rgyu dag dang mtshungs //
translated: It is like a mirage.

original: zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: This is what is said.

original: ji ltar sa'i 'gyur ba dang / nyi ma'i 'od zer phrad pa las smig rgyu'i tshogs snang ba dang po mthong ba yang phyis 'jig par 'gyur ba de bzhin du nye bar dmigs pa'i yul rnams la rnam par shes pa 'byung ba ni dngos po med cing mtshan nyid dang bral bas sngon dang phyi
analyzed: ji ltar sa'i 'gyur ba dang / nyi ma'i 'od zer phrad pa las smig rgyu'i tshogs snang ba dang po mthong ba yang phyis 'jig par 'gyur ba de bzhin du nye bar dmigs pa'i yul rnams la rnam par shes pa 'byung ba ni dngos po med cing mtshan nyid dang bral bas sngon dang phyi
translated: Just as a mirage appears at first when the conditions of the earth, the configuration of the earth, and the sun’s rays come together, but later it is destroyed, in the same way, consciousness arises in relation to objects that are perceived, but they are devoid of entity and devoid of characteristics.

original: ma mi 'phrad pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: ma mi 'phrad pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir /
translated: Since they are devoid of an essence that is connected to the past and the future,🔽they are of a different nature.

original: mi 'dra ba'i rang bzhin can yin pa las byis par gyur pas mtha' gcig tu rtog cing 'dug la /
analyzed: mi 'dra ba'i rang bzhin can yin pa las byis par gyur pas mtha' gcig tu rtog cing 'dug la /
translated: However, because they are childish, they remain fixed on a single conception.

original: kun rdzob kyi bden par rtogs pa'i gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i cha gnyis su snang ba de yang gang stong zhing rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba gzod ma nyid nas ma skyes pa'i sems kyi chos nyid du bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: kun rdzob kyi bden par rtogs pa'i gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i cha gnyis su snang ba de yang gang stong zhing rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba gzod ma nyid nas ma skyes pa'i sems kyi chos nyid du bstan pa yin no //
translated: The appearance of the two parts, the apprehended and the apprehender, which is realized as the conventional truth, is also empty of itself and is taught to be the reality of the mind, which is luminous by nature and primordially unborn.🔽In order to demonstrate that it is like a reflection,

original: gzugs brnyan dang 'dra ba nyid du bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: gzugs brnyan dang 'dra ba nyid du bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: it is said:

original: gzung bya gzugs brnyan lta bu ste //
analyzed: gzung bya gzugs brnyan lta bu ste //
translated: The apprehended is like a reflection,

original: thog ma med pa'i sems las byung //
analyzed: thog ma med pa'i sems las byung //
translated: arising from beginningless mind.

original: rnam par shes pa'ang de 'dra ste //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'ang de 'dra ste //
translated: Consciousness is also like that,

original: phan tshun gzugs brnyan dag dang mtshungs //🔽zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: phan tshun gzugs brnyan dag dang mtshungs // zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: mutually like reflections.

original: gzung bya zhes bya ba ni kha phyir bltas pa goms pa'i bag chags kyi dbang du byas pa ste /
analyzed: gzung bya zhes bya ba ni kha phyir bltas pa goms pa'i bag chags kyi dbang du byas pa ste /
translated: The “apprehended” refers to the power of habitual tendencies that are cultivated by the outward-looking mind.

original: gzung ba nyid du mngon par zhen pas /
analyzed: gzung ba nyid du mngon par zhen pas /
translated: Since one is attached to the apprehended,

original: gnyis su med na yang ngo bo nyid gnyis su so sor snang bar gyur pa'o //
analyzed: gnyis su med na yang ngo bo nyid gnyis su so sor snang bar gyur pa'o //
translated: even though there is no duality, two natures appear separately.

original: gzugs brnyan lta bu ste zhes bya ba ni gzugs brnyan dang mtshungs pa gang yin pa de la ni gzugs brnyan lta bu zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: gzugs brnyan lta bu ste zhes bya ba ni gzugs brnyan dang mtshungs pa gang yin pa de la ni gzugs brnyan lta bu zhes bya ba ste /
translated: Like a reflection means that which is similar to a reflection is like a reflection.

original: me long gi dkyil 'khor gyi nang du chud pa'i bzhin la sogs pa dang 'dra ba'o //
analyzed: me long gi dkyil 'khor gyi nang du chud pa'i bzhin la sogs pa dang 'dra ba'o //
translated: It is like a face, etc. , that is contained in the circle of a mirror.

original: thog ma zhes bya ba ni thog ma med pa'i dus kyi sems kyi rnam par 'phrul pa las byung ba'o //
analyzed: thog ma zhes bya ba ni thog ma med pa'i dus kyi sems kyi rnam par 'phrul pa las byung ba'o //
translated: Beginningless means that it arises from the evolution of mind since beginningless time.

original: de gang zhe na /🔽sems las byung zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: de gang zhe na / sems las byung zhes bya ba ste /
translated: What is that?🔽It is the mind and mental factors.

original: sems nyid las byung bas na sems las byung ba zhes bya ba yin te /
analyzed: sems nyid las byung bas na sems las byung ba zhes bya ba yin te /
translated: It is called mind and mental factors because they arise from the mind itself.

original: de tsam du rjes su 'brel ba'i phyi'i dngos po la ltos pa med la zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
analyzed: de tsam du rjes su 'brel ba'i phyi'i dngos po la ltos pa med la zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
translated: To that extent, they are not dependent on external things that are related to them.

original: de bas na de ni gzugs brnyan lta bu ste /
analyzed: de bas na de ni gzugs brnyan lta bu ste /
translated: Therefore, it is like a reflection.

original: spyi dang khyad par gyi dus nyid kyis rnam par brtag sna yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: spyi dang khyad par gyi dus nyid kyis rnam par brtag sna yod pa ma yin no //
translated: It does not exist as a universal or as an individual characteristic.

original: 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi rnam @5a * //
analyzed: 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi rnam @5a * //
translated: Not only that, but it is also like a dream.

original: par shes pa'ang de dang 'dra ste zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: par shes pa'ang de dang 'dra ste zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Consciousness is also like that.

original: rnam pa de nyid dang cha 'dra ba'i shes pa gang yin pa de la rnam par shes pa'ang de 'dra ste zhes bya'o //
analyzed: rnam pa de nyid dang cha 'dra ba'i shes pa gang yin pa de la rnam par shes pa'ang de 'dra ste zhes bya'o //
translated: That consciousness which is similar to that aspect is also like that.

original: 'ang zhes bya ba ni bsdu ba ste /
analyzed: 'ang zhes bya ba ni bsdu ba ste /
translated: Also means inclusive.

original: 'dzin pa yod pa'ang de dang 'dra ste /
analyzed: 'dzin pa yod pa'ang de dang 'dra ste /
translated: Apprehending is also like that.

original: gzung bar bya ba dang bral na 'dzin pa po 'ang yod pa ma yin no bya bar dgongs te /
analyzed: gzung bar bya ba dang bral na 'dzin pa po 'ang yod pa ma yin no bya bar dgongs te /
translated: If there is no object to be apprehended, then the apprehender also does not exist.

original: 'brel pa'i sgras ni phan tshun gcig la gcig ltos pa yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: 'brel pa'i sgras ni phan tshun gcig la gcig ltos pa yin pa'i phyir /
translated: The word “mutually” means that they are mutually dependent on each other.

original: phan tshun gzugs brnyan dag dang mtshungs //🔽zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: phan tshun gzugs brnyan dag dang mtshungs // zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: They are like mutual reflections.

original: gzung bar bya ba dang 'dzin po ni gcig la gcig ltos par bya ba yin te /
analyzed: gzung bar bya ba dang 'dzin po ni gcig la gcig ltos par bya ba yin te /
translated: The object to be apprehended and the apprehender are mutually dependent on each other.

original: de gnyis kar dmigs pa'i phan tshun rjes su 'brel pa'i ngo bo nyid ni rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i sems kyi chos nyid yin no zhes bya bar dgongs so //
analyzed: de gnyis kar dmigs pa'i phan tshun rjes su 'brel pa'i ngo bo nyid ni rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i sems kyi chos nyid yin no zhes bya bar dgongs so //
translated: The nature of their mutual connection, which is the object of both, is the reality of the mind, which is luminous by nature.

original: rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i sems de nyid kyang gzung ba dang 'dzin pa dang bral zhing /
analyzed: rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i sems de nyid kyang gzung ba dang 'dzin pa dang bral zhing /
translated: That very mind, which is luminous by nature, is free from the apprehended and the apprehender.

original: 'dod chags la sogs pa dang ma rig pa'i dri ma spangs te /
analyzed: 'dod chags la sogs pa dang ma rig pa'i dri ma spangs te /
translated: It is pure, having abandoned the stains of desire and so on and ignorance.

original: rnam par dag par gyur pa ni yod do zhes mngon par zhen pa spangs par bya ba'i don du chu zla dang mtshungs par bstan par bya ba'i phyir //
analyzed: rnam par dag par gyur pa ni yod do zhes mngon par zhen pa spangs par bya ba'i don du chu zla dang mtshungs par bstan par bya ba'i phyir //
translated: In order to abandon the conception that it exists, it is taught to be similar to a reflection of the moon in water.

original: bsgom pa dang ba'i rgyud la ni //
analyzed: bsgom pa dang ba'i rgyud la ni //
translated: In the continuum of one who is clear about meditation,

original: ye shes zla ba gang byung ba //
analyzed: ye shes zla ba gang byung ba //
translated: the moon of wisdom that arises

original: mngon sum yod pa ma yin te //🔽de ni chu zla dag dang mtshungs//
analyzed: mngon sum yod pa ma yin te // de ni chu zla dag dang mtshungs//
translated: is not an existent that is directly perceptible,

original: zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: but is similar to a reflection of the moon in water.

original: bsgom pa ni sems rtse gcig pa'i mtshan nyid can te /
analyzed: bsgom pa ni sems rtse gcig pa'i mtshan nyid can te /
translated: Meditation is characterized by a one-pointed mind.

original: de gang la yod pa de ni bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: de gang la yod pa de ni bsgom pa'o //
translated: One who has that is a meditator.

original: dang ba ni bag chags kyi rnyog pa dang bral ba'o //
analyzed: dang ba ni bag chags kyi rnyog pa dang bral ba'o //
translated: Clear means free from the turbidity of traces.

original: rgyud la zhes bya ba ni lus dang ngag dang yid kyi rgyud de /
analyzed: rgyud la zhes bya ba ni lus dang ngag dang yid kyi rgyud de /
translated: Continuum refers to the continuum of body, speech, and mind.

original: rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba lugs las bzlog cing /
analyzed: rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba lugs las bzlog cing /
translated: It is the reverse of dependent origination.

original: yang dag pa'i ye shes skyes pa'i bdag nyid can la'o //
analyzed: yang dag pa'i ye shes skyes pa'i bdag nyid can la'o //
translated: In the one who has the nature of having generated the true intuition.

original: ye shes zla ba gang byung ba //
analyzed: ye shes zla ba gang byung ba //
translated: The moon of intuition that has arisen

original: zhes bya ba ni yang dag pa'i ye shes ni ma rig pa'i mun pa sel cing nyon mongs pa'i gdung bzhi bar byed la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni yang dag pa'i ye shes ni ma rig pa'i mun pa sel cing nyon mongs pa'i gdung bzhi bar byed la /
translated: The true intuition removes the darkness of ignorance and cools the burning of the afflictions.

original: bag chags kyi dri mas ma gos pas zla ba dang chos mthun pa'i phyir /
analyzed: bag chags kyi dri mas ma gos pas zla ba dang chos mthun pa'i phyir /
translated: And because it is similar to the moon in not being soiled by the stains of habitual tendencies,

original: ye shes zla bzhes bya la /
analyzed: ye shes zla bzhes bya la /
translated: it is called the moon of intuition.

original: de rgyud dag pa gang las byung zhing shar ba de yang dngos por gzung du med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de rgyud dag pa gang las byung zhing shar ba de yang dngos por gzung du med pa'i phyir /
translated: And because that moon of intuition, which has arisen and emerged from the pure stream of being, cannot be apprehended as a real entity,

original: mngon sum yod pa ma yin te //🔽zhes bya ste /
analyzed: mngon sum yod pa ma yin te // zhes bya ste /
translated: it is not directly perceptible.

original: de ltar snang du zin kyang gang gi phyir mngon sum du dmigs shing gzung du med do //
analyzed: de ltar snang du zin kyang gang gi phyir mngon sum du dmigs shing gzung du med do //
translated: Even though it appears in that way, it cannot be directly perceived and apprehended.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

analyzed: stong pa nyid kyi chos rnams @5b las stong pa nyid kyi chos rnams kho na 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because empty phenomena arise only from empty phenomena.

original: de bas na gzod ma nyid nas ma skyes pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de bas na gzod ma nyid nas ma skyes pa'i phyir /
translated: Therefore, because it has not arisen from the beginning,

original: de ni chu zla dag dang mtshungs //
analyzed: de ni chu zla dag dang mtshungs //
translated: it is like the moon in water.

original: zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ste /
translated: This is the second chapter, the chapter on the benefits of bodhicitta.

original: 'di ltar chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid yin pas na dngos po la mngon par zhen pa mngon sum du dmigs su yod pa ma yin no ;
analyzed: 'di ltar chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid yin pas na dngos po la mngon par zhen pa mngon sum du dmigs su yod pa ma yin no ;
translated: Thus, since it is the essence of the dharmadhatu, the direct perception of the object of clinging to things is not found.

original: / de ltar de kho na nyid yin pa'i phyir chos thams cad dmigs su med pas mngon sum du bya bar mi nus she na /
analyzed: / de ltar de kho na nyid yin pa'i phyir chos thams cad dmigs su med pas mngon sum du bya bar mi nus she na /
translated: If one asks, “Since it is thusness, all phenomena are not found and so cannot be directly perceived,”

original: mngon sum du bya ba'i thabs chos thams cad nam mkha' dang mnyam par bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: mngon sum du bya ba'i thabs chos thams cad nam mkha' dang mnyam par bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: in order to teach the method of direct perception, that all phenomena are equal to space,🔽it says,

original: rnal 'byor ba yi ye shes gang //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ba yi ye shes gang //
translated: The wisdom of the yogi

original: de yang nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de //
analyzed: de yang nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de //
translated: is also characterized by space.🔽Therefore, all that is to be known

original: de bas shes dang shes bya dag / thams cad nam mkha'i mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: de bas shes dang shes bya dag / thams cad nam mkha'i mtshan nyid do //
translated: is characterized by space.

original: zhes bya ba smos te /🔽'di ltar zhi gnas te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba smos te / 'di ltar zhi gnas te /
translated: Thus, it is said.

analyzed: sems rtse gcig pa'i mtshan nyid dang / lhag mthong ste /
translated: Thus, it is the characteristic of the one-pointed mind of shamatha and vipashyana.

translated: The one who has the yoga of the union of the characteristics of correct wisdom is called a “yogin.”🔽The wisdom of those who have that yoga is the wisdom of suchness, which is the nature of the non-abiding nirvāṇa because all phenomena have the characteristic of space.

original: 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa la mi gnas pa'i ngo bo nyid thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med par gyur pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bdag nyid can te /

translated: That wisdom of suchness is the nature of the tathāgatas.

original: de yang phung po dang khams dang skye mched la sogs pa spros pa'i bdag nyid can ma yin te /
analyzed: de yang phung po dang khams dang skye mched la sogs pa spros pa'i bdag nyid can ma yin te /
translated: Moreover, it is not the nature of the proliferations of the aggregates, constituents, sense spheres, and so on.

original: gang de bzhin nyid kyi bdag nyid can chos kyi dbyings mi g-yo ba'i ngo bo nyid kyis gzod ma nyid nas ma skyes pa'i rang bzhin te /
analyzed: gang de bzhin nyid kyi bdag nyid can chos kyi dbyings mi g-yo ba'i ngo bo nyid kyis gzod ma nyid nas ma skyes pa'i rang bzhin te /
translated: The nature of suchness is the dharmadhātu, the essence of immobility, the nature of primordial non-arising.

original: 'gro ba dang 'od ba la sogs pa'i ngo bo nyid dang bral ba'i phyir dngos po med pa'o zhes kyang brjod par nus pa ma yin te /
analyzed: 'gro ba dang 'od ba la sogs pa'i ngo bo nyid dang bral ba'i phyir dngos po med pa'o zhes kyang brjod par nus pa ma yin te /
translated: It cannot be said to be a non-entity, because it is free from the nature of going, coming, etc.

original: dgag par byed pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dgag par byed pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because there is no negation.

original: ma skyes pa'i ngo bo nyid du yang yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: ma skyes pa'i ngo bo nyid du yang yod pa ma yin te /
translated: It does not exist as the nature of non-arising,

original: de bas na /
analyzed: de bas na /
translated: therefore,

original: de yang nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de //
analyzed: de yang nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de //
translated: it is also the characteristic of space.

original: zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: It is said.

original: spros pa thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir ;
analyzed: spros pa thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir ;
translated: Because it is free from all conceptual elaborations,

original: nam mkha' dang 'dra bas na nam mkha' ste /
analyzed: nam mkha' dang 'dra bas na nam mkha' ste /
translated: it is like space, therefore it is space.

original: de nyid kyi mtshan nyid can gyi mtshan ma gang yin pa de nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de /
analyzed: de nyid kyi mtshan nyid can gyi mtshan ma gang yin pa de nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de /
translated: That which has the characteristic of that is the characteristic of space.

original: gang gi phyir rgyu des na chos thams cad sgrib pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gang gi phyir rgyu des na chos thams cad sgrib pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because of that cause, all dharmas are of the nature of non-obstruction.

original: gtan tshigs de bas na shes pa ste /🔽khams gsum @6a * //
analyzed: gtan tshigs de bas na shes pa ste / khams gsum @6a * //
translated: Therefore, that is the reason.🔽The mind and mental factors that enter the three realms

original: par zhugs pa'i sems dang / sems las byung ba rnams kyang nam mkha'i mtshan nyid yin la /
analyzed: par zhugs pa'i sems dang / sems las byung ba rnams kyang nam mkha'i mtshan nyid yin la /
translated: are also of the nature of space.

original: shes bya dag ste /
analyzed: shes bya dag ste /
translated: And the objects of knowledge🔽are also of the nature of space.

original: des mthong ba'i yul ma rig pa'i rjes su zhugs pas snod dang bcud kyi 'jig rten gyi mtshan nyid can sems can rnams kyi phung po khams dang skye mched la sogs pa'i ngo bo nyid ni shes bya ste /

translated: The essence of the aggregates, elements, sense spheres, and so on of sentient beings, characterized by the world of the environment and its inhabitants, is the object of knowledge, since it is the object seen by that consciousness, which is engaged in ignorance.

original: shes pas yul du byas pas shes bya nyid tsam du rjes su 'brel cing khong du chud par bya ba'i shes bya gang yin pa de ni yul nyid du yongs su brtags pas shes bya zhes bya la /
analyzed: shes pas yul du byas pas shes bya nyid tsam du rjes su 'brel cing khong du chud par bya ba'i shes bya gang yin pa de ni yul nyid du yongs su brtags pas shes bya zhes bya la /
translated: That which is to be related to and understood as merely the object of knowledge, since it is made into an object by consciousness, is called the object of knowledge, since it is fully qualified as an object.

original: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la ni /
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la ni /
translated: But omniscient gnosis

original: de gnyi ga yang nam mkha' dang mnyam mo //
analyzed: de gnyi ga yang nam mkha' dang mnyam mo //
